name: Redbelly
intro: Democratised Economic Infrastructure for Regulated Assets
introduce: Redbelly is a Web3 infrastructure for regulated assets that brings the enforceability of regulation from the real world to meet the efficiency and innovation of the digital world. All participants on The Redbelly Network are identified through the network of off-chain digital identity providers. Redbelly was built to provide certainty in the regulated asset world by offering known counterparties and real time monitoring. Users can also rely on fixed transaction costs, agreed terms, and certified data.
